metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8787 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The PoDoFo::PdfXRefStreamParserObject::ReadXRefStreamEntry function in base/PdfXRefStreamParserObject.cpp:224 in PoDoFo 0.9.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
